actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage and the target must make DC 13 Con save or contract the sewer plague disease.

actions.name: Makeshift Weapon
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit 5 ft. or range 20/60' one target 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage P or S

special_abilities.name: Aura of Mechanical Mishap
special_abilities.desc: The bilge gremlin's presence interferes with nonmagical objects that have moving parts such as clocks crossbows or hinges within 20' of it. Such objects that aren't being worn or carried malfunction while within the aura and if in the aura for more than 1 min they cease to function until repaired. If a creature in the aura uses a nonmagical object with moving parts roll a d6. On a 5 or 6 weapons such as crossbows or firearms misfire and jam and other objects cease to function. A creature can take its action to restore the malfunctioning object by succeeding on a DC 13 Int check.

special_abilities.name: Filth Dweller
special_abilities.desc: The bilge gremlin is immune to disease.
